SML: Size Matters

Is it possible to create a game in 72h? Absolutely and it is quite common in GameJam events. Together with my friend, we decided to take part in one of such events, the result of which is SML: SizeMatters.

My main task in this project was to design and implement game mechanics.

Game available on the platform:

Itch.io
